str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Visible form, shape, appearance, outward show, kind, species, class. From eido; a view, i.e. Form.
